Element.Name: DOCUMENT LEVEL ALLOWANCES AND CHARGES
Element.Description: A group of business terms providing information about allowances applicable to the Invoice as a whole. A group of business terms providing information about charges and taxes other than VAT, applicable to the Invoice as a whole.
Use “true” when informing about Charges and “false” when informing about Allowances.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge reason code
Element.Description: The reason for the document level allowance or charge, expressed as a code. For allowances a subset of codelist UNCL5189 is to be used, and for charges codelist UNCL7161 applies. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge reason
Element.Description: The reason for the document level allowance or charge, expressed as text. The Document level allowance reason code and the Document level allowance reason shall indicate the same allowance reason

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge percentage
Element.Description: The percentage that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance base amount, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. To state 20%, use value 20.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge amount
Element.Description: The amount of an allowance or a charge, without VAT. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge base amount
Element.Description: The base amount that may be used, in conjunction with the document level allowance or charge percentage, to calculate the document level allowance or charge amount. Must be rounded to maximum 2 decimals

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge VAT category code
Element.Description: A coded identification of what VAT category applies to the document level allowance or charge.

Element.Name: Document level allowance or charge VAT rate
Element.Description: The VAT rate, represented as percentage that applies to the document level allowance or charge.
